title: I lost the thread I was following
author: wheitman

posts.post_title: I lost the thread I was following
posts.post_content: I was following a thread about T206.  Had "super set" in it and now I can't find it,  Help

Here's the link. It's still on the main page.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=163614[/url]

You can subscribe to a thread if you go advanced and it will email you every time there's a new post.

[quote name="wheitman" post=1091247]I was following a thread about T206.  Had "super set" in it and now I can't find it,  Help[/QUOTE]

Click on your name...the the first little drop down says something like "view public profile". Click on that. You will see your 4 posts and their threads and can click on them right there.
